rooms.description: Large entrance hall with ample natural lighting and Vastu compliance.
Spacious living room centrally located for family gatherings. Windows on the east as per Vastu recommendations.
Dining area adjacent to kitchen for seamless service. Positioned in south quadrant.
Modern kitchen with efficient workflow and ventilation. Located in the north-east corner.
Luxurious master bedroom with ensuite bathroom, placed on the west side for privacy.
Secondary bedroom for guest or children. Placed in north-west quadrant aligning with Vastu principles.
Bathroom adjacent to master and secondary bedrooms.
Dedicated home office with north facing windows for concentration.
Quiet library space integrated into living area. Oriented towards the east to harness energy.
Separate servants quarters with basic amenities. Located in the south-east corner for easy access and privacy.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed to be inviting while ensuring security.
Balconies adjoining living room and bedrooms for natural ventilation and view.
Strategically placed windows to maximize daylighting according to Vastu guidelines.
